mapper.select: SELECT template_id, template_type, to_recipients, cc_recipients, endpoint, enabled, created_at, updated_at FROM mt_template_definition WHERE template_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mt_template_definition ( template_type, to_recipients, cc_recipients, endpoint, enabled, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{toRecipients, typeHandler=com.bob.mta.common.mybatis.StringListJsonTypeHandler}, #{ccRecipients, typeHandler=com.bob.mta.common.mybatis.StringListJsonTypeHandler}, #{endpoint}, #{enabled}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mt_template_definition SET template_type = #{type}, to_recipients = #{toRecipients, typeHandler=com.bob.mta.common.mybatis.StringListJsonTypeHandler}, cc_recipients = #{ccRecipients, typeHandler=com.bob.mta.common.mybatis.StringListJsonTypeHandler}, endpoint = #{endpoint}, enabled = #{enabled}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE template_id = #{id}
